The titanic mouse couldn't bring herself to interrupt what was going on. Annie had taken to her fans with incredible speed, smothering them with her ample bosom or letting them take pictures and admire her body. Not wanting to feel entirely superfluous, Tiffany did issue one small warning towards the pig.

"Please be careful with them, they're not as strong as us."

"You got it, partner." She oinked happily, barely looking up from the man she was about to give a large kiss. He squirmed a bit as she overwhelmed his senses, her passionate smooch nearly sucking his head into her mouth. It sent the rest of the crowd wild, more of them demanding the same treatment.

"Y'all are insatiable, I should set up a kissin' booth. I'll be richer than Helen in a week." She joked, putting her one lucky fan down. She fished the other out of her bathing suit, filling it up with several new occupants and ordering all who want a kiss to line up. A few backed out seeing the drool-soaked state of the last recipient, but the rest of her fans were undeterred, forming a queue.

Several minutes ticked by with each of the anthros entertaining their own little crowd of fans. Shenny carefully let them see every immense corner of her body whilst Tiffany gave a brave fan an even more overwhelming kiss, smothering his head between her lips. Rowland posed for more pictures before coercing a few of his fans to flash their tits at him. The lecherous cougar giggled, loving how lewd the humans were willing to get with him. He wondered if he could set up another meeting someplace more remote so he could lose the speedo and show them everything. Annie worked her way through every man and woman lining up for a smooch, frequently slotting a few new lucky volunteers in her bathing suit too. By the end of it she had actually worked up a bit of a sweat, wiping the moisture from her brow.

"Wow, you guys. I thought only Punchy would've been able to make me work that hard."

"Well, have you considered doing what we did?" Tiffany remarked.

"What're you talkin about?" The pig raised a curious eyebrow.

"Well, when I was causing mayhem the Pint Puncher only showed up to lock me away and then he was off to whatever threat was next. Now we spend evenings at Shenny's place playing with him. She's his girlfriend, but that doesn't mean he's not got time for us, you know. And trust me, he's got a thing for heroic gals."

"And guys." Rowland added with a laugh.

"Shut it, you, he's not into that." Tiffany chided.

"Give me a couple days to change that for you." The cougar replied jokingly, returning his attention to his adoring fans.

The pig was about to fly into a brash tirade about the Pint Puncher and Shenny when suddenly a devious idea shot into her mind. The giant mouse girl was right about one thing. Punchy never stayed around unless she physically held him down. But what if she played along with this? She would finally be able to show him that she's a far better choice for the superhero than any of these oversized hussies. She would make love to him in ways that'd have that silly little man forget all about Shenny and live happily ever after with the woman of his dreams. Before she could daydream about the wedding too a voice rang from below.

"Sorry I'm late to the party, can I have a kiss, miss Annie? I've never kissed anyone before..."

The sow's heart melted. This guy looked a little nerdy and no older than 16. She gladly obliged, picking him up in both hands and providing him with a first kiss that he'd never forget. She almost pitied the human girls that would have to compete with this experience. She lowered him back down before changing her mind and giving him a big hug too, mashing him into her boobs. The man let out a small gasp and as his head was wedged between the soft globes a small crack was heard. Annie's blood ran cold and she immediately pulled back. She barely did anything, how could that have happened? Thankfully it was just the guy's glasses that had snapped.

"Oh, sorry." She said, blushing brightly.

"N... no problem." He stammered, still love-drunk from her kiss.

"And you get a lot more fans as a hero, trust me." Shenny piped in. Annie vaguely nodded, still thinking about the nerdy guy that wanted her of all people to be his first kiss. Humans were weird, the Pint Puncher more than any of them.

"Okay fine. I'll stop trying to get his attention by breaking things. But you gotta do something for me."

"Sure, what is it?" Tiffany smiled. She didn't think getting Annie to join them would be as easy as this, but something told her she already knew the pig's demand.

"I want some time with Punchy. Not to steal him away or anything, just to have some fun with the guy without needing to hold him down."

"Ugh, fine." Shenny moped. It felt like the Pint Puncher's time was spent more with others than with her lately, but she knew this was the right thing to do. He probably won't like the impromptu 'date' they just set up with him and the pig, but he would understand what's at stake. She wasn't about to let the pig off easy though. The wolfess stood up, towering over Annie, and leaned down, flashing her a large toothy grin. "But if this is some kind of scheme to take my boyfriend from me I'll take you down. I don't care how scared everyone is of your strength, there's nothing stronger than my love for him."

The pig was ready to throw down right there and then, angered at the words of that insolent wolf. But hearing the fans around her gasp as she balled her fists snapped her out of it. She'd teach that jealous mutt who the Pint Puncher really belonged to, but not here and now. "Oh, sorry y'all, didn't mean to scare ya. Let's get back to the fun stuff." She said, laughing awkwardly and hoping to suss the tense mood. Thankfully the fans went straight back to praising her and hollering lewd suggestions at all the heroes.

1553332333333322112131321112122211111111.content:
While the giant trio were busy entertaining their adoring fans, the Pint Puncher had been speaking with the director of the facility regarding Dr. Wong’s condition. The normally gruff Abott proved surprisingly receptive to the news, though that was partly due to him having suspected such was the case. It never made sense to him that despite all they knew about this unique energy and its effect on the human libido that she would remain unchanged after having exposed herself to it. So long as it didn’t interfere with her research, he wasn’t at all concerned with what she did with her test subjects. The only demand he made was for her to refrain from wiping their memories afterwards, as he didn’t want to run the risk of her causing them any neurological damage.

Once they were done discussing things, the hero walked alongside Wong to her lab. He had hoped to see her shed her cynical character and engage with her coworkers, but she continued to wear her usual dreary expression as she passed them by. Once they were back in her lab, she shut the door behind them and took in a deep breath. As she turned to face him, the expression that greeted him caught him completely off guard. Her stony gaze had greatly softened and her permanent frown replaced with a cute smile. Before he could comment on it, she stepped forward and wrapped her arms around him in a tight embrace.

“Thank you...” she murmured before pulling away,

“For what? “ the hero asked with a slight chuckle.

“If it wasn’t for you, the rest of my life would be spent trying to hide my condition. I was too stubborn to properly address it and too proud to make peace with it… but now things are different. I’m done pretending to be something I’m not…”

The Pint Puncher smiled and nodded. While they weren’t always cordial with each other, he still considered the doctor a friend and felt good in helping her. With his business done there, gave her a friendly pat on the arm before stepping out of the room. As he stepped out, he bumped into what felt like a large cloth covered wall. A familiar musky stench nearly made him wretch and he looked up to find that he had walked into Boris’ crotch.

“Oops! Sorry little guy! Didn’t see ya down there!” the boar said with a hardy laugh as he brushed past him. The hero raised a brow as he looked back to see him walking into Wong’s lab, the good doctor greeting him with a wide smile. With her secret now out in the open, she didn’t even bother trying to hide her intentions, her hungry eyes leering at his crotch as she ushered him inside and closed the door behind them. The hero shuddered as he imagined the kind of debauchery she had in store for him, though he couldn’t help but laugh.

“Well… she’s certainly going to be making a lot of friends around here…” he said as he exited the facility. In the distance, he could see his giant companions just barely peeking over the buildings. The alarm hadn’t gone off, so they couldn’t have been fighting a villain. Knowing them, they probably were getting mobbed by adoring fans.

“Come to think of it, it’s been awhile since I’ve mingled with normal people” the hero thought out loud. He certainly enjoyed the fame and respect his job brought him, but he seldom took time out of his day to interact with his fans. Perhaps he felt a bit envious at the attention that his friends had acquired as he suddenly felt compelled to go over and join in on the fun. He smiled and flew over to them expecting an animated response upon his arrival.

Unfortunately for him, the reaction he would receive would far exceed his expectations. The moment he came into view for the group, an excited, girlish squeal rang pierced the air. His heart filled with dread as he knew what that sound indicated. Before he could even brace himself, he was snatched from the air and pulled into the powerful arms of his most passionate fan, Annie. The plus sized sow had been the first to spot him and had leapt into the air with speed unbefitting someone of her size. She came crashing back down to the earth, but didn’t appear the least bit fazed as she smothered the hero in her overly affectionate embrace.

“Oooooh, Pint Puncher, it’s been ages since I last held you in my arms! I was startin’ think you forgot about me!” she giggled as she nuzzled the top of his head.

“Annie… what did I… say about... personal space…?” The Pint Puncher wheezed as the air was forced out of his lungs from her powerful grip.

“Oh… right”

Surprisingly, the pig was quick to relent as she let him go and took a step back. His rejection didn’t diminish her enthusiasm as she rocked back and forth with barely contained excitement. The hero sighed and brushed himself off, his attention turning to the three giants who, save for Shenny, watched him with much amusement. Why, he wondered, hadn’t they apprehended her yet? Granted, she wasn’t much of a threat given her lack of genuine interest in crime, but she was a criminal all the same. Although, part of him just wanted her to be locked away and out of his hair for good.

“Guess what, suga? I got to talkin’ with the fellas and they convinced me to give up bein’ a bad guy! Isn’t that great?!”

The Pint Puncher raised a brow, the dour expression on his face still lingering. He didn’t see this news would present much of a change. A large portion of her offenses came as a result of her airheaded callousness, so her choosing to abstain from villainy didn’t mean a whole lot. Annie took no notice to his unimpressed face as she continued with a blush.

“I mean, the only reason I ever got into the game was to get your attention, but ya never stick ‘round long enough for us to really… bond” she said as she leaned in batting her eyes.

“Right… that’s… wonderful. Not be rude, but we’ve got to finish patrolling the city” the Pint Puncher said as he turned to leave. He was quickly yanked back into the pig’s tight embrace, though her grip was a bit more laxed than before.

“Hold on, suga. We ain’t seen each other in weeks and already you’re leavin’?” she said with a pout. “How come everybody else gets to spend time with ya but me? I been your biggest fan for ages and you never give me the light o’ day!”

The Pint Puncher was about to rebuke her yet again when the crowd of onlookers decided to add their two cents.

“Yeah! Why don’t you spend some time with her?”

“What, are you too good to spend time with your biggest fan?”

“Come on, don’t be so heartless!”

The hero sighed inwardly as he looked over at the crowd. He had arrived hoping to enjoy the same praise that the others had gotten and instead he was being browbeaten into indulging the amorous pig. Still, she did have a point. When he was willing to befriend Rowland, someone who once engaged in acts that the hero would normally deem unforgivable, he had little excuse for not showing leniency towards Annie. The most he could say that he found her annoying and he was far too good natured to tell her flat out.

“Alright, fine. I suppose… we can hang out for a while” he said begrudgingly.

Annie let out another excited squeal and gave him a sloppy kiss on the cheek. The hero glanced up at his girlfriend who shrugged in return. She wasn’t fond of the idea, but this was the most effective way to keep the pig in line. Another sloppy kiss brought his attention to Annie as she looked at him with a wide grin.

“Soooo… I was thinkin’, after we’re done entertainin’ these fine folk, you and I can get to…”

"Wait, what? You're serious about this?" The hero stammered, caught off guard by the hefty sow. He'd just assumed her declaring herself a hero was another way to try and get his attention for however long it took to wrap him in an inescapably strong hug or something. But she'd been good with that before, releasing him without a fight. Maybe that was the other three looming over her to keep her in check, but he still wasn't sure what to think of it.

"Helloooo, Earth to Punchy. You in there?" Annie giggled at the hero's dazed expression. Not one to waste a moment, she planted another slobbery kiss on his face. That finally seemed to do the trick, pulling the Pint Puncher back into here and now as he sputtered in her arms.

"Hmmm, what a guy, ain't that right, people?" She hollered, drawing a large cheer from the crowd. The hero freed himself from her arms and wiped the worst of the pig drool away. He composed his thoughts on the matter.

"Hehe, alright. But first I gotta say hello to all my fans." He raised his arms as the crowd gave him a raucous applause. He landed among them and shook hands with everyone. The ladies in the crowd were eager to get a kiss too, but the superhero reminded them that they'd have to ask the titanic wolfess first. Knowing the Shenny only reluctantly permitted the oversized sow to smooch him they opted not to press their luck, choosing instead to fondle his spandex-covered body. It was nice to receive this kind of love. The hero had definitely missed it.

As time went on all the superheroes entertained their own little crowds. The Pint Puncher and Rowland even got into an impromptu contest to see who was more attractive. They both posed and flexed, showing off their impressive muscles. The white spandex left not a feature unseen on the hero but the sheer size of the cougar won him some serious points too. It was close, but in the end Rowland won, catching him by surprise.

"Wow, I thought about beating you a lot back when I was a villain. But I don't think I ever thought this would be how it happened. Hah, better luck next time, Punchy." He laughed, striking a powerful victory pose. The hero could practically see the cougar's ego growing. As though it wasn't big enough already. Some of the more attentive onlookers in the crowd also noticed his speedo getting a little tighter than usual. The enormous cougar was definitely happy to win. Rowland was too drunk on victory to notice and nobody else seemed to care.

As the fun wound down Annie sidled up close to the superheroes. The Pint Puncher was the first to speak up. "Alright, let's make up for lost time. We've still got a patrol to finish."

"Oh, I know. Why don't we split up? That way we'll have this covered twice as fast." Tiffany suggested. The towering mouse had a point. There were five of them now, having them all stick together seemed like overkill.

"Alright, we'll cover the outskirts of town, you two head to the city center. Those places are harder to navigate when you're huge." Shenny suggested dryly, playing along with her friend's little game. It was quite obvious the mouse was trying to help Annie and the Pint Puncher find a moment for themselves and the pig smiled from ear to ear listening to the idea. They all nodded and parted ways. The giants were barely out of earshot before Annie began talking to the hero.

"So, what do ya think, partner? Annie and Punchy, crime fighters. Didn't think I'd be sayin that today." She mused aloud.

"That makes two of us." The hero chuckled to himself.

"Give it to me straight, Punchy. Do ya think I got what it takes?" She asked, cheerful as always. But it made the superhero stop in his tracks.

"Annie, I don't know. Like, do you have any idea how to fight crime? And I don't mean literally, like against supervillains. Lots of criminals are just humans."

"I mean, what's the difference, right? A crime's a crime." She shrugged, her smile never leaving her face.

"No no no." The hero laughed wearily. It felt like this would be a long patrol. But if the pig was really that eager to prove herself, he'd best give her the basics before she hurts someone. "Okay, you probably already know regular humans are fragile and weak. Just because they did a little crime doesn't mean you're allowed to go all out on them. It doesn't even mean you're allowed to fight them. You've just gotta subdue them and take them to a police station."

"Subdue them? Like sit on 'em?" She looked a little puzzled at him.

"That'd kill them. I mean hold them down and make sure they don't run away. But without hurting them. I suppose in your case you could just grab them. If I can't get out of those hands easily, a regular Joe doesn't stand a chance. Just take away any weapons they might have and take them to the police. They will handle the rest for you. Though I imagine they'll probably look at you weirdly the first few times." He smirked, trying to put himself in a policeman's perspective. The pudgy sow dropping off masked bandits seemed almost comical to him, but it's pretty much what he was aiming for.

"Okay. I think I got it, sugah." Annie nodded. "Thanks for teaching me." She pulled the hero in for another slobbery kiss, the Pint Puncher just smiling and accepting it. Almost on cue a scream for help echoed from a nearby alleyway.

"Oh, showtime." The sow smiled and barreled towards the alleyway. Charging across the road nearby caused an accident, but the hefty pig was only interested in showing the hero she could be a good guy too.

The Pint Puncher had lagged behind a bit, having to stop and apologize to the citizens that she had inconvenience in her recklessness. He quickly caught up with her, rounding the corner to find her in the alley with a large masked man hemmed up against the wall. A young woman sat beside Annie with her hands grasped tightly onto her pocketbook. She didn’t appear all that grateful, though the hero could hardly blame her. Sure enough, Susan sauntered onto the scene, hands on her hips. "I just wanted to show you my affection, but you had to go and struggle. C'mon, it's not every night we get to hang out under the blood moon." She cupped her breasts and squeezed them, showing off their size. "Doesn't the idea of getting acquainted with this body under the ruby red light of the celestial body interest you?" As she spoke, she ran her hands from her breasts down past her hips and cupped her buttocks. "The best part: you won't have to do a thing~ I can just pick you up with my new telekinetic powers and work you however I like~"

The Pint Puncher realized that this fight would be harder than he thought.

1553332333333322333.content:
The Pint Puncher began to fly around, when he noticed a peculiar set up nearby. Before him was a bunch of off street lights craned around to shine down on a red carpet, which seemed to be decorated with pink feathers. The Pint Puncher then realized who might be behind this. The hero flew towards the site, and landed at the end of the carpet. At that, the lights lit up one by one, starting at the Pint Puncher's end and lighting up too the other end. The lights finally lit up upon a familiar flamingo, except she appeared to be wearing a pink robe. Fiona did indeed set this up.

"Why, hellooooooo there," she said with a flourish. "How nice of you to meet with me tonight. I was hoping all this setup wouldn't go to waste." The Pint Puncher narrowed his eyes at the pink villainess. She was just as tall, if not a little taller, than he remembered. He had no idea what was with the robe though. She sauntered down the carpet, towards the hero. "It's gettin' pretty dicey out here. You sure you don't wanna hide with the rest of those humans?"

"And miss the chance to beat down punks like you? I can't wait to show you all who's boss," the Pint Puncher shot back, only to be greeted by a chuckle from the wicked winged beast.

"Please, Puny Puncher, do recall your dalliances," Fiona began. "How many times have you been at our mercy? At my mercy alone?" The Pint Puncher simply raised his fists and got ready to strike her. She was a couple of yards away from the hero, and brandished a great big smirk. "Perhaps you've got it reversed. Maybe it's YOU who needs to be taught who's the boss." With that, she clenched, and thrust her wings outwards, letting the robe flap open and revealing her voluptuous form. However, the robe began to shift about unnaturally. It then began to fall apart into flamingos that looked like smaller Fionas, boasting similar voluptuous forms.

The flamingos all flew off of Fiona's body and into the air, and began to convene onto the hero's location. As they drew near, the Pint Puncher realized that they were surrounding him. Worst yet, they were poised to strike him rear first.
1553332333333322333.title: Fiona

The Pint Puncher mounts his counter attack
15533323333333223331.content:
The Pint Puncher clenched his fists and prepared to dodge the oncoming army of mini-Fionas. While they were smaller than the original flamingo, they still towered over his small body. They ranged in size between 6 and 8 feet tall and all owned sculpted bodies of identical proportions to the original Fiona. How the original villain, even at her massive size, managed to carry all of them as if they were a robe twisted the hero's mind.

But he didn't have time to dwell on the physics of that feat. The flamingo army was prepared to strike, ass first. One flamingo launched at him in a move similar to a Peach Bomber. The hero's enhanced reaction time allowed him to dodge out of the way. Unfortunately, his peripheral vision was not on par with his reflexes. As he dipped to the side to let the first flamingo fly by, he crashed right into the rump of another one!

This newest flamingo laughed as she felt the hero's head make contact with her soft ass. Before he could push himself away, yet another flamingo crashed into him from the side, sandwiching his head between their soft flesh. They laughed to themselves as they pushed their booties against each other, squashing his head in between.

"Heeeeey Punchy!" the flamingos called and taunted in unison.

With a surge of strength, the hero managed to press one hand against each of their plump backsides and shove them away. But before he could refocus and mount a counter attack, a horde of flamingos pounced on him, bring him in butt flesh. One landed squarely on his face, another on his chest, two more on each of his arms and legs. Finally, one last large flamingo landed ass first squarely on his crotch.

"Don't fight us Punchy, we just want to play!" the horde of flamingos sang in a chorus. "You're right where you belong, beneath us!" they laughed.

Fiona drew closer and towered over the pile of flamingos sitting atop the hero. He would burn with rage if he could see her face, if his eyes were not covered by a pile of flamingo flesh.

"Relent and enjoy yourself Punchy, like I said, let us teach you your place!" she laughed.

The Pint Puncher seethed in rage, but he felt an excitement well up within him as the horde of flamingos laughed and giggled and shifted their weight over his body. It didn't really hurt, but they certainly had him pinned securely. But the hero's resolve was far from broken. He resisted the pull of excitement he felt and the desire to submit to the seductive flamingos and waited for the right moment. Finally, he caught all of the flamingos just in the right spot at the right moment, with their weight shifted off of his body at once. He surged upward and pushed the horde off of him. His erection slipped deeper into the largest flamingo's backside and his face briefly visited depths of another's crack, but they too were shoved off of him as he shook himself awake and knocked the cobwebs from his mind.

He cracked his knuckles and prepared to go after the original Fiona, but this fight was far from over.

He scanned along the leg to behind him, and spied one of the flamingoes, who've stretched out a leg to catch him. He was confused, Fiona never had stretchy powers.

Before he could consider further, that flamingo whipped her leg back, yanking the hero towards her. As he flew forward, the next thing he saw was the flamingo's rear expanding, practically punching him as he came back, sending him sprawling onto his back.

"Surprised?" the flamingo said. "We've expanded beyond our mistress' powers, and have achieved all sorts of others' skills. My stretch is only one of the powers the rest of us have." With that, she gave her rear a taunting smack before sauntering off, the hero still dazed. While he was still seeing double, two flamingoes approached, each on either side of him. The two of them held flirtatious grins as their eyes scanned his body.

Then...

1553332333333322333112.content:
The two flamingos approached the hero quickly. He realized he had no idea what he was getting himself into in this fight, but he shook his head clear and took a fighting stance, ready to defend himself. Quickly, the flamingo to his right lashed out with a kick, which the Pint Puncher easily dodged. Unfortunately for him, her true intention was not connecting with the kick. Her leg continued to grow as it wrapped around his body. He squirmed and struggled, but he was held fast!

His eyes registered shock, but before he could use his super strength to flip his attacker and free himself, he began to feel dizzy and disoriented. He tried to clear his head again, but it was no use. He couldn't figure out the problem. There was no way the grip of this flamingo's leg around him was strong enough to weaken him so intently! His eyes grew wider still as he heard laughter from outside of his line of sight. He had completely forgotten about the second attacking flamingo!

He managed to turn his head and saw the second flamingo had her hands all over his body, shifting and manipulating his human form to suit her desires and pleasures.

"Noooo!" he screamed and intensified his efforts to free himself, but the first flamingo had lied down on her back, pulling the hero with her. He was grounded. The second attacker had already shoved his legs up into his body and his arms were still completely secured. There was nowhere he could go!

His mind scanned through options for escape, focusing on previous battles with Baron and with Gilda. He had never fought the two at the same time, but surely in one of those fights there was some kind of a clue to his salvation!

Suddenly, he felt his first attacker's grip loosen and his arms flop free. Before he could respond to do anything, the flamingo expanded her ass and plopped down happily on his face.

After what seemed like an eternity, Frannie huffed and stood up off of the Pint Puncher's face. Florette quickly moved to his face, completing her body molding project. She held up the Pint Puncher's new form with a smile and the girls cheered. He gasped as he realized what was about to happen.

How about more villains.

Mare Storm - Once upon a time, five mares lived together on a farm. They despised being under other humans, so when they got their powers, they decided to use them to overpower humans. Each five have a power of their own, and a latex suit separating them each by color. Brawny is the muscular mare with wrestling moves and a red latex suit. Gummy is the mare with the blue latex suit and the ability to transform those she touches into a gum-like being. Stinky is the mare with extreme BO and the green latex suit. Squishy is the super sized mare that loves to squash anyone and wears the orange latex suit. Lovey is the mare in pink latex that can hypnotize anyone into doing her will with extended touch. Virmir - A large bat with terrifying powers. As a bat, he loved spreading terror, which only made things worse when he got powers. Through this, he earned all sorts of spooky powers, such as hypnotism, telekinesis, projecting shadows, and all sorts of stuff like that. He is hard to subdue, so be careful.

15533323333333231.content:
The Pint Puncher had noticed a sudden bit of reprieve. He could barely remember when villains weren't attacking, so now that there was a break, he decided to lounge about. However, his reprieve would be short lived as he heard a lot of commotion nearby. Deciding that he should check it out, he flew over. As he approached, he began to notice a bunch of cars smashed up. The citizens seemed to run off, thankfully, but the villainesses were still around. The Pint Puncher saw five mares, two looking exceptionally large, and each wearing latex outfits that were identical, except for the colors. From left to right, he saw red, blue, pink, green, and orange.

He flew over and slammed down in front of the mares, who looked awfully pleased with themselves.

'Who are you guys?" the Pint Puncher asked.

"Hear that girls? The famous hero doesn't know who we are," the mare wearing pink said. "Why don't you gals introduce yourselves?" They each nodded, and began to walk forward. "First up, Brawny!" she announced. Before the Pint Puncher could react, he was suddenly grappled. The mare with the red spandex had wrapped the hero in a crushing bearhug, and he felt himself compress into her firm body. "This girl earned extra muscles when she could walk upright. She loves long walks on the beach and crushing any shrimp she comes across!"

The Pint Puncher tried to push against her, but she was just as strong as, if not stronger than, him. After a bit of squeezing, she lifted the hero overhead before throwing him into the concrete. He was immediately dazed on impact, and Brawny posed before the cheering mares before walking off. The hero was barely getting his bearings back before the mare in blue walked over to him. "Next up, we have Gummy!" She gripped his shoulders, and a blue energy glowed around her hands, and it began to spread to the hero. "This gal earned the power to knead anyone she gets her hand on into a fine, taffy-like being. She loves jogging and tasting gummy humans!"

Sure enough, the pink-wearing mare was telling the truth. He began to feel funny, a lot squishier. Soon, she stopped glowing, and began to roll up the hero, who was molding into a ball. He got tinier and tinier, until he was the size of a piece of candy. She then worked at the hero suit wrapped around the hero. She peeled it off like it were a candy wrapper, and licked her lips. The hero tried to scream as she placed him in her mouth. She clamped her teeth down on him and began chewing. The hero winced as he felt her molars grind into him and her tongue taste him.

After a bit of chewing, she spat the hero out. He flew through the air, and felt himself splat against some mare booty. A very smelly mare booty wrapped up in green latex. "Annnnnnnd now, we got Stinky!" The Pint Puncher winced at her name. She certainly lived up to it. She pinched the wad of Pint Puncher on her cheek, and peeled him off. She scrubbed him deep into her pits, whiched just made him try to quirm even more. He tried to move, but his gummy state left him immobile. "Our gal here was given some nasty BO following her power acquisition, and she's been putting her stench to good use. She loves boat cruises and gassing some poor fool!"

At that, Stinky flashed a wicked grin. She held the flattened form of the Pint Puncher in front of her butt, lifted her tail, and farted on him. He tried to cry out in absolute horror. He smelled a lot of horrid smells, and Stinky's gas was pretty high up there. After that, she rolled the hero up, and flicked him away from her. Gummy then snapped her fingers, and the hero was back to normal, though he was naked. He began to hear some loud stomping. He looked behind him, where the stomping was coming from, and saw the giant, orange clad mare approaching him.

"Now presenting, large and in charge, though not really, Squishy!" The Pint Puncher tried to get up, but he got an unfortunate view of her truck sized rump before she threw out her feet and slammed down onto him. The concrete caved in under her from the sheer force, and the hero felt like he was just struck by a mountain. "When she got her powers, they came with a miraculous growth spurt. She loves candy and squashing little bugs!" Squishy shook her ass side to side on top of the Pint Puncher, grinding him into the concrete. With a quick shake, she got off of him, and smacked her rear at him tauntingly.

He grit his teeth and got ready to fly up to face her, but the pink clad mare already wrapped her arms around him. "And lost, but certainly not least, Lovey~!" she said as her arms began to glow pink. The Pint Puncher tried to pull himself out of her grip, but he began to feel himself lose the will to fight. It was a familiar feeling, like if he were facing Hank or Muro. Uh oh. "You may have guessed it already, but I was given the chance to be completely and totally irresistible. I love a nice dinner date, and any human giving up their will to serve me~" The Pint Puncher tried to squirm out of her grip, but he felt himself losing the will to fight more and more.

"Now that we introduced ourselves, is it time to fight? You hardly seem in the mood for it. Riiiiight~?" At that, the Pint Puncher felt a funny feeling stir between his legs. He suddenly remembered he was naked, and his groin would be completely exposed to her. Not good. She rubbed the hero up and down on her, rubbing his erection against her smooth coat. He let out an involuntary moan, feeling so ashamed for letting her manhandle him like this. However, she let go of him, letting him flop onto the concrete. "Too easy. C'mon, 'hero,' we need you to fight too if we're gonna enjoy dominating you.""

The Pint Puncher was burning with embarrassment. The fight barely began, and he was already naked and erect. He got up to his feet, and saw the mares huddled around each other. They were planning something. Perhaps the opening to their first "real" combo. They broke away, and...

Maybe it was Lovey's distance or maybe it was sheer instinct and self defense. Either way, he was glad it did. Everything was back to normal. She laughed as she bounced her chest over the hero's smaller body, sending him crashing back to the turf.

As the Pint Puncher recovered from the surprising blow, his eyes opened wide in shock to see Gummy had capitalized on his error, She was seated on his still erect crotch and had her hands firmly planted on his shoulders. A familiar blue energy started to emanate from Gummy's hands and it quickly spread to the hero's downed body. I'm going to love this, just let me know if it becomes too much for you dear. But you'll have to be loud, voices tend to get muffled down there," she said with a laugh.

Down...where, the Pint Puncher wondered to himself. As if she was answering for him, Squishy grabbed the hero in a secure fist and brought him around to her lower back. She pulled the orange spandex away from her waist, displaying her enormous, fur covered ass to the hero. He swallowed hard at the sight, but was unable to verbalize his terror. Not hearing the begging and pleading she was hoping for, Squishy plunged her hand down to her ass and pulled it out empty. "Awww, all tired of fighting little guy," the pink-clad Lovey cooes as she gently lifts the Pint Puncher out of the crater Brawny had created. She carried him in her arms and stroked his hair from his face, all the while her eyes darting up and down his battered body.

Maybe it was the beating he had taken at the hands of her friends, maybe it was the submission he had already shouted to Brawny, or maybe it was Lovey's hypnotic influence, but he just didn't feel like fighting. Before he could get away, he gets pinned down by the toned butt. Lydia then chuckles as she wiggles her butt to get the hero wedged into her covered crack.

Immediately, the Pint Puncher flew forward. He was prepared to ram the eel in the torso. If he took a moment to consider what she had planned, he would've seen her smirk at him. At the last moment, Lydia's upper body swayed to the side, dodging the Pint Puncher's strike, all while her legs were planted firmly where she stood before. When the Pint Puncher was right over her legs, she flung her upper body over the Pint Puncher, then wrapped herself around him, pulling him off of his flight path and firmly holding him in place with her torso.

She snickered as she put both of her hands behind her head, leaning back really casually while keeping up a steady pressure.

"Like a fish to a net," Lydia taunted, nonchalantly tapping a foot as she stretched her upper body, constricting her torso around the hero's midsection. The hero, meanwhile, pounded against the eel flesh coiling around his body. Occasionally, she relaxed her grip, enough to let the hero breathe, but not enough to let him pull himself free. She repeated her process, constricting and unconstricting.

"Let go!" the Pint Puncher demanded as he tried to push himself free of the bindings. Lydia, meanwhile, was barely putting in any effort. The Pint Puncher could swear he felt the force of one of Borris' bearhugs from Lydia's squeezing. The hero knew he needed to escape. He kept pushing and pushing...

It was very rare for there to be a normal day now that villains have surfaced. And unfortunately, today would be no different. For, even in a world with big boars and gassy hippos, who'd expect to see a giant, scale-covered horse boasting lady-like attributes, in addition to a trident made of pearl, at the shore of a beach harassing some people? Well, believe it or not, a certain scaly horse was assaulting a beach. This was Aprhodite, the transformed seahorse. And she was currently inhaling deeply, sucking several people towards her maw. If anyone knew of her before, they'd know she could suck with more than her mouth.

A couple were just about to be sucked up, when a certain white blur whipped them away and carried them far from Aphrodite. They didn't even take the time to thank the mysterious figure. Soon, the beach was clear, several humans being saved, but a few ending up in her belly. Something the figure had to remedy. Of course, said figure was the white-clad hero himself: Pint Puncher.

"You have a lot of nerve, squirt," Aphrodite hissed out. "Or are you here to feed your goddess?"

"You cough up those people, or I'll make you spit them up," the hero said. He got ready for a fight while Aphrodite held her trident such that she appeared ready for a fight.

Before he could prevent this, however, he was struck by her fat, scale-covered belly, and felt the wind push him deeper into her flesh as she descended. With a loud THOOOOM, he was sandwiched between her massive belly and the sand beneath. He had been crushed under a lot of bad guy flesh, but her hard scales felt exceptionally painful!

"Oh I get it, you wanted to get acquainted with your new home! Well get a feel and take a listen, cause that's where you're gonna spend the rest of your time," Aphrodite said as she rubbed side to side. The hero felt like a giant saw blade was running over his body. He couldn't believe he never felt torture like this. Before long, however, Aphrodite got up, making sure to pluck the hero by the legs and hoist him in front of her mouth.

"Well, with a start like that, I can't imagine you accomplishing anything. So, I may as well finish you here." With that, she flung the hero high up in the air, him dazed by the previous beat down. He descended, and...

155333233333332332232111.content:
The dazed hero was not able to withstand the powerful vortex and soon his frantic attempts to fly away tired him out. With his resistance fading he began to approach the gaping maw faster and faster. Aphrodite smiled as she maintained her grasp on the hero, salivating ever more as he was drawn closer to her mouth. She could practically taste the hero already. He would make a fine addition to the prey in her belly. His super-powered squirming would feel heavenly. She stopped daydreaming the moment she felt his hand touch her mouth. Instantly it became clear the Pint Puncher would not go down without a fight.

In his last moments outside her maw he had adjusted himself to grab onto her upper jaw whilst planting his feet on her lower jaw, forcing them open with all his strength. She tried to bite down, but the hero's might surprised her. It took all her focus to even get a small bit of progress and the moment she stopped trying to chomp down he pushed those jaws right back open. Suddenly she realized she'd found another game. Aphrodite could tell from his weary groans that he couldn't keep this up forever. He had to slip away or her throat was his only destination. With that in mind she began to occupy all his time with powerful attempts to bite down on him, forcing the Pint Puncher to use all his strength. His body trembled under the immense duress the villain was putting on him, but he never faltered. Not that it mattered to Aphrodite. She already had an ace in the hole and she was about to showcase it.

The Pint Puncher grit his teeth, hoping to outlast the monster before it could eat him. When he saw her long, slender tongue approach he knew things were about to get considerably more difficult. He tried his hardest to ignore the slimy muscle as it dragged its soggy surface over his body. His resolve finally broke when it coiled around his waist and pulled. It was the proverbial straw that broke the camel's back and he folded beneath the pressure. Almost literally as the powerful jaws shut, trapping him inside. His struggle left him aching with strained muscles and unable to fight back against the rapidly approaching gullet. Aphrodite capitalized quickly on the weakness of her opponent. Now was her moment and she would seize it to the fullest. His squirming legs were fed to her throat first, the powerful muscles clamping down and pulling in more of the hero. In several loud gulps he was but a wiggling bulge sliding down her neck to join the rest of her prey.

In the mammoth stomach of the villain he landed atop a small group of slime-soaked people. They were beginning to panic, seeing their hero swallowed up just like them. The Pint Puncher quickly told them to quiet down. This was all part of the plan. He needed to get in to save them. His lie was convincing enough, but now the hero faced a new challenge. How is he going to save these people from digesting in here? Trying to push back up her throat would take super strength and he'd just end up in her maw again. She probably wasn't going to just let him go after a stunt like that, not to mention there's no chance for any of her victims to crawl the same way. Punching her gut would probably cause her to squeeze her belly. The hero could probably handle that, but the other people in her stomach would surely die. The only other way was the back door. He shuddered at the thought, but unless he could come up with a different plan, crawling through her intestines seemed like the only viable option.

How do the Pint Puncher and the other swallowed humans escape?

While the other animals immediately attacked the city upon gaining their powers, Kelli explored the internet, only getting into some minor mischief as she soaked up all the information she could. All these months spent in front of a computer screen while binging on snacks has made the poor doe quite pudgy, but after all her preparation, she was finally ready to execute her master plan. A plan that was certain to bring about the fall of the legendary ‘Pint Puncher’ she’s heard so much about, and make her a viral sensation across the web...

1553332333333323322331.content:
The city was quiet. Too quiet.

It's been so long since a villain has attacked, the Pint Puncher was almost worried they were planning something. He'd been cooped up in his safehouses monitoring the city all day, only to fail to catch a single trace of suspicious activity. Now that it was past midnight, the high-strung hero decided it was about time to give himself a break. Maybe the onslaught of evil, super-powered animals was finally over. Maybe he could just relax and focus on stopping regular criminals from now on, like he's always wanted. He chuckled at the thought as he flew through the darkened city. He was currently on his way to his favorite bakery, to pick up some of the delicious pastries that always manage to calm him down. When he landed, though, he realized just how ominous the city was tonight. There wasn't a single person in sight, nor a car on the road. He felt a chill as he peered through the door of the bakery, only to see over a dozen people huddled inside, staring at him. "Are you all alright in here?"

“It’s him! It’s the Pint Puncher!” A panicked voice shouted from within. “Run!” The hero stepped back in awe and horror at the spectacle of all the civilians desperately fleeing from the building and running away down the street. What has gotten into them? Was there some villain inside? The Pint Puncher stepped curiously into the bakery to investigate, only to see that familiar baker, Jenny, hiding behind the counter, peeking out at him, looking absolutely terrified.

“Oh God!” She whimpered as he walked in. He had been a regular at her store for a while, and he considered her a friend... but now she was acting like he was some kind of monster! “T-take whatever you want! Just please, don’t hurt me!”

“What? Jenny, you know me. I would never-” He said, taking a step forward to calm the poor woman, only to gasp in shock as Jenny rushed away, and jumped through the nearest window!

“You’re never taking me alive!” She yelled, pulling herself up and sprinting away without skipping a beat. The superhero watched her leave, dumbstruck. Why were they all so afraid of him now? Before he could ponder the question for long, he overheard something interesting on one of the bakery's TVs.

“... martial law has been declared in the city after news broke of its one and only defender succumbing to ‘corruptive influences’...”

He turned his attention to the television, to see it was turned to the local news station. There, a reporter in a green dress was speaking in a panicked voice before a backdrop of what looked to be pure chaos. “Yes, to those tuning in now, all reports and witness testimonies have been conclusive; the Pint Puncher has gone mad,” she said. The Pint Puncher felt his heart skip a beat when he heard those words. This had to be some sort of misunderstanding. His eyes were glued to the screen as he waited for any clarification. “The following footage of his unprovoked massacre in Maplewood Park has sent shockwaves through the city. Be warned that the footage you are about to see is graphic.”

After another graphic content warning, the screen switched over to shaky camera footage of the Pint Puncher in the local park. He recognized the scene immediately — it was from a fight he had with Quaker last week. However, it seemed someone had carefully edited Quaker out of the footage, and replaced her with random civilians, so it looked like he was just punching people at absolute random, sending them flying. “What…?” He clenched his fists in fear and anger when he realized what was happened. “No… no, no, no! That footage is fake! I’m being set up!” Unfortunately, there was no one around to hear him. In the eyes of the citizenry, he was already a guilty man.

As the Pint Puncher paced angrily, pondering his next course of action, the television screen returned to the reporter. “The city has been taken under military jurisdiction. They want to assure citizens that they have multiple contingencies in place to deal with the situation once and for all,” she explained. “A strict curfew is now enforced. Citizens are advised to stay in their homes and immediately report any sightings of the Pint Puncher…” As if on cue, the Pint Puncher heard multiple APCs pull up in front of the bakery, and even heard a helicopter roaring overhead. He was almost blinded as the helicopter shined its spotlight through the windows, a voice on a megaphone shouting...

“Come out with your hands up! We have you surrounded!”

“Damn it…” Normally, the Pint Puncher would comply, but he couldn't be sure who to trust at the moment. As far as he knew, the military could be in on this conspiracy. Besides, any time spent locked up in a cell getting interrogated was time he could've been spending getting to the bottom of this mystery. Knowing time was of the essence, the Pint Puncher rearing back and punched a whole through the back wall of the bakery, sneaking out into the darkened alleyway behind the building. Unfortunately, the punch made a ruckus, and before he knew it, two heavily armored soldiers were pointing their guns at him.

“There he is!” One of the shoulders shouts, their gun-mounted flashlights blinding the hero. “Don’t move!” The Pint Puncher freezes in place, slowly raising his hands in the air... until, in a moment, he takes off soaring into the sky at maximum speed! The soldiers fire off a few shots, but he's far too fast for them, and the superhero escapes in an instant. As he flew back through the city, he cursed himself for having not noticed all the recently-installed military fortifications donning every major building, as the soldiers slowly spread out and searched for him. Luckily, the darkness of night kept him from being noticed most of the time, and he was more then fast enough to dodge the few stray bullets he had to deal with.

Eventually, he landed at his most secure, most secret safehouse. This was the bunker he went to when every other place he could hide was probably compromised. The place was completely, 100% secure... or so he believed. But, as if the night couldn't get any worse, he eventually finds the safehouse busted open and ransacked, papers and valuables spread all over the floor. Whoever had broken in was long gone by now, but they didn't seem to have taken anything, so it couldn't have been the police, nor robbers. As he tried to figure out who had infiltrated his bunker, and how, he noticed a strange IRC program had been left open on his laptop, with a single message from an unfamiliar user; 'DoughyDoe86'. Raising a brow, the Pint Puncher sat down and started typing...

<DoughyDoe86> bin watchin the news! looks lik ur in trouble! (๑•́ω•̀) maybe i could b of service?
<_PP_> Who are you?
<_PP_> Are you the one who created that footage?
<DoughyDoe86> i’m the only frnd u hav left! evrebody else hates u now.
<_PP_> Tell me who you are or I’m not talking.
<DoughyDoe86> u rly think ur in control here, huh? welllll, funny story... ur not! (｀∀´)Ψ
<DoughyDoe86> unless u want 2 spend the rest of ur life in prison, u’ll do as i say. capiche?
<_PP_> What do you want?
<DoughyDoe86> i just want 2 hang out! meet the man behind the mask.
<DoughyDoe86> i might not clear ur name, but i’ll definitely keep u out of prison.
<_PP_> What are you talking about?
<DoughyDoe86> meet me @ 3184 vixen drive. don’t keep me waiting! ԅ( ˘ω˘ԅ)
*** DoughyDoe86 has left #PPisdead

He slammed his fist down in frustration when the user logged off, accidentally smashing his desk in two. Judging by the username, it wasn't hard to put two and two together. One of those damned evil animals was behind all this! He should've known from the very beginning. They couldn't defeat him mano a mano, so they tried to turn the people against him. Well, he wasn't about to stand for it! The truth would win out, in the end. He just had to clear his name... and he figured that address was the best place to start. Finding nothing else of value in the safehouse, the Pint Puncher took the skies once again, eager to meet his opponent somewhere they weren't hiding behind a computer screen. Making his way to the address, he finds he had been led to...

The hero found himself standing before an apartment building in the middle of the city. The outside bore white bricks with red highlights, as if forming an outline for the building. From out here, it looked to be about 6 floors high, and 6 rooms wide. The Pint Puncher double checked the address, and sure enough, this was 3184, Vixen Drive. <DoughyDoe86> up 2 203. Take me with u.

The Pint Puncher noticed a charging cord attached to the laptop, and unplugged it, before picking it up. He proceeded up the stairs, and to room 203. There, he saw the door was open a crack. He wasn't sure what kind of villain was behind this. He wasn't even sure if they were behind this door. What he did know was that this may've been his only shot at stopping this. So, he opened the door. And within, in addition to several cameras pointed at the door, he saw...

15533323333333233223312.content:
The address had led him to a warehouse by the sea, in a very remote part of town. A fitting place for a fight, he supposes. After he faced whatever dastardly villain was behind all this, he’d be able to clear his name once and for all. Now, normally he’d use his strength to breach the building from an unexpected angle, but it seemed like the place was heavily fortified and barricaded, leaving him only one choice of entry; the front door, which was hanging wide open, as if inviting him inside. It was dangerous, but it was the only way in, so the Pint Puncher slowly inched his way down the hall, his fists raised, ready for absolutely anything.

Click!

The second he wandered into the darkened warehouse, he was suddenly blinded by a brief flash of agonizingly bright light. He had walked into a trap! He stumbled around in a panic as he rubbed his eyes, his vision clouded by a blurry blue haze that slowly faded away. When he could see again, he found himself standing on a stage on one end of the warehouse, seemingly alone. Along the floor in front of the stage was an arrow of chairs, though instead of an audience, each chair held an old CRT television pointed towards the stage. He flinched, covering his eyes as a spotlight shined onto the stage.

Suspended above the chairs was a huge flat-screen television screen, which clicked to life on its own as the Pint Puncher stood there, baffled by his surroundings. What was this? The stage looked set up for some kind of game show. As the screen before him flickered on, it showed what looked to be a chunky doe woman, with a black t-shirt and jeans which both seemed to be a few sizes too small for her. She was huddled over a computer screen in a darkened room, her office chair creaking under her weight as she chomped down on a few potato chips while fiddling with her keyboard.

She squints as she leans forward, staring into the screen as if straining to see the young man on the stage, before smiling. “Oh, hey! Well, if it isn’t the man himself!” She smiled, her face lighting up in excitement. The sheer size of the screen she was broadcasting from made her look like a giant. “Sorry we couldn’t meet in person. I’d rather not run the risk of getting punched.” She laughs. “Anyway, allow me to introduce myself; I’m Kelly, and soon, I’m going to be known as the doe who defeated the evil Pint Puncher, once and for all.”

“Who are you?” The hero shouted, pointing at the screen angrily, clenching his other fist.

The doe simply giggled at the Pint Puncher’s childish display. “Temper yourself. I don’t know if you noticed, but I’ve got the entire building rigged to blow with the push of a button,” she points out with a devious grin. The Pint Puncher’s heart sinks when he looks around and notices that there were, indeed, dozens or perhaps hundreds of high explosive devices hidden around the warehouse, with wires running along the floor allowing them all to be detonated remotely. The superhero was tough, but if she set off the explosives, he would be blown to dust. He was trapped. Just as he was realizing his situation, the smaller televisions in the chairs started blinking to life. “Oh! It looks like we have an audience.”

The humiliated hero watches in bewilderment as the televisions turn on to show what looks to be like webcam footage from people all over the city. Not only could he see them, they could see him — and they looked rather angry. “Welcome, ladies and gentleman, to my very first livestream! Here with a very special guest; the Pint Puncher!” The ‘audience’ booed loudly as the hero stood there stoically, trying to keep his cool and plot out his next move. “Now, now. I know our former hero might not be winning any popularity contests nowadays… but he can still put on a good show! With a little help, of course.” She giggled as she loudly tapped at her mechanical keyboard, apparently setting things up for the ‘oncoming’ show.

“Now, first off, by very popular request — the costume. Take it off,” she said, getting some cheers from the ‘audience’. A smug grin spreads across the doe’s face as the Pint Puncher freezes up, looking both horrified and confused in equal measures. “You heard me. Let’s see the man behind the mask.” It took some goading, but knowing what the consequences would be for disobedience, the Pint Puncher sheepishly pulled off his signature mask, revealing his true face to the ‘audience’. For a moment, he hoped that would be enough. “I said take it all off… or I'm ending this stream with a bang.” The Pint Puncher notices her finger hovering over the detonator.

Amid the sadistic jeering of the crowd, the humiliated Pint Puncher slowly slipped off his spandex suit, knowing it was his only option for survival. Every inch of clothing he removed only left him feeling more and more humiliated. Despite the fact that he was technically alone in the warehouse, the fact that he was apparently being broadcast to the internet. Even if he did manage to clear his name, he wasn’t sure if he would ever be willing to show his face around town again. Eventually, his suit and cape slipped to the floor at his feet, leaving him completely exposed on the stage. The doe smiled, waiting for the audience to quiet down before she continued.

“Now, just so you know, this first stream here is a little bit ‘premium’. Maybe you recognize some of those faces,” she said, waving her arm out dramatically in front of her as if gesturing to the ‘crowd’ of television screens, each representing one of the stream’s viewers. “These are some of the family and friends of your victims in Maplewood Park… and tonight, they’ll be deciding your fate.”

“What…?” The Pint Puncher stood, shocked, before he realized what this was. “N-no! I didn’t do anything! I’m being set up!”

“Pffft! Save it for the judge! … if you even survive that long, that is,” she laughed, before flicking a switch. Suddenly, all of the television screens turned off, except for one; showing a young woman who looked pissed off. “Alright, well, it’s up for our top donor to throw the first stone. User 43; Angela. What do you want done with ‘im?” This ‘top donor’ didn’t hesitate for a moment before giving her reply. She’d obviously thought about this well in advance.

Just what form of ‘justice’ would be dispensed on the Pint Puncher? Something merciful… or something he’d have to struggle to even survive?

155333233333332332233121.content:
“Unleash the F.E.L,” the woman's spiteful voice demanded.

The Pint Puncher tensed up when he heard a roller door sliding open on the other side of the warehouse. Hearing something robotic lumber into the factory, he immediately braced for a fight. What came around the corner, though, wasn’t nearly what he expected. From the smooth, shiny, segmented white design, he recognized it as one of Nexxxus corp’s infamous sex robots. This was unlike any of the models you’ve seen in their advertisements, however. It seemed to have a tail, a snout, and the ears of a fox… and most notably, it was seven feet tall! As it stepped forward, he realized that the robot was based on one of his rivals, Felicia… and it was quite an anatomically correct representation, too.

“Recognize the chrome, Pint Puncher? That’s Nexxxus corp standard, baby. They make fun toys for all the lonely men and women out there,” you hear the doe say over the speakers while he gazed in shock. “I heard they were having a special promotion - making bots based on all your favorite super villains. But just looking up to the schematics, they just didn’t live up to the originals.” She laughed. “So I thought… why not hack the shipment, take control of the bots, and make my own ‘improvements’?”

You knew what she meant by ‘improvements’. The entire robot, besides its crotch, ass and tits, was covered in makeshift combat armor and wrapped in spikes and barbed wire. One of its hands was removed, replaced with what looks like the long barrel of a machine gun. The most notable feature, though, was the bot’s glowing red eyes, which felt like they pierced his very soul. “I’ll have you know, it has all the latest in pleasure technology! Why don’t you two get acquainted?” The doe pressed a button, and suddenly the robot turned to face the Pint Puncher, its eyes glowing brighter as it prepared to fight.

It’s every move was jagged and uncanny, every part of its body twitching unnaturally as it slowly raised its gun. “H̴o͠w̵ ̴̨ça̶͜͢n̷ I͏ s̡er̴͢vé͡ ͞y͟ơ͘҉ú,͞ ̨͘m͏̸́a̸̧͜s͏͠t͏e̴̛͘r͘?̵͘”͠ It spouted a garbled, distorted pre-recorded line through its broken speakers. The puncher was so frozen by terror that he just barely flew out of the way when the machine opened fire! Bullets tore wildly through the walls of the warehouse, throwing up dust and debris as the pint puncher narrowly dodged the spray. The bot was capable of rotating its entire torso around to continue firing at the hero, eventually pinning him down behind a concrete beam. Amidst the gunfire, he could faintly hear the ‘audience’ cheering.

Now in cover, the Pint Puncher tried to compose himself, coming up with a plan as the bullets slowly destroyed the beam he was hiding behind. Eventually, he heard the gun click off, the barrel overheating. Without a moment’s hesitation, he flew at the bot, his fist raised. “Take this!” He said, soaring towards it and landing his fist against its torso with incredible force. “Agh!” His punch made the robot slide back a bit, but it seemed mostly unharmed. Meanwhile, the Pint Puncher was clutching his blooded fist in agony. He was used to punching organic opponents - apparently, it wasn’t a good idea to try and punch something made of metal, spikes and barbed wire.

"T̶͘͜h̵͢͜a͠t̸͏ w̵as͟͟͝n'́͢͞t͘͠͏ ̡v͞͏e̸r̴̕͟y͘͜ ́͏n̨į̷̷ćę̷.́҉͘" The robot ‘said’ as it recovered from the blow. As the Pint Puncher clutched at his damaged punching hand, he looked up to see the F.E.L step forward and raise it’s own fist! Before he could react, the machine’s huge, metallic hand collided into his stomach, sending him flying into a nearby, concrete wall. With a groan, the Pint Puncher crumpled to the floor, beaten and humiliated in front of the entire internet. He tried to muster up the strength to fight back as he heard the robot approaching… but before he could, it bent over and lifted his naked body up by the neck. He gagged and wriggled weakly as it held him in the air, convinced it was planning on choking him. However, to his surprise, the robot instead suddenly pulled him in for a hug.
